chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_902
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
3 months on ART.
o If VL < 50 c/mL, repeat VL at delivery.
• Known HIV-positive women already on ART:
o VL at first/booking visit in ANC,
o If VL < 50 c/mL, repeat VL at delivery.
• Known HIV-positive women, who are not currently on ART, but are ART exposed (e.g. previous VTP, or ART
LTFU) and who are initiating a DTG-containing regimen:
o Do 1st VL at 3 months on ART.
o If VL < 50 c/mL, repeat VL at delivery.
• Remember to insert the laboratory barcode sticker and record all VL, TB, and syphili
